<<<<<<< HEAD
The foundation of Christian religion gathered into sixe principles. And it is to be learned of ignorant people, that they may be fit to heare sermons with profit, and to receiue the Lords Supper with comfort. Perkins, William, 1588-1602.
[8], 40 p.
By Iohn Legatt, printer to the Vniuersitie of Cambridge, Printed at London : 1618.
Printer's device on title page and on verso of C8, final page. Cropped and tightly bound affecting some text. Signatures: A-C. Reproduction of the original in Emmanuel College (University of Cambridge). Library.
=======
